abstract: Improvement in investment banking led Credit Suisse to a second-quarter profit of $1.5 billion the bank reported Thursday.
snippet: Improvement in investment banking led Credit Suisse to a second-quarter profit of $1.5 billion the bank reported Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Improvement in its investment banking business led Credit Suisse to a second-quarter net profit of 1.6 billion Swiss francs, or $1.5 billion, the bank reported Thursday, The New York Times’s Julia Werdigier and Mark McDonald wrote.
